news.summary: The Music Legends series by Royal Mint has previously celebrated the likes of Queen, Elton John, and David Bowie

news.title: Fontaines D.C. and Inhaler among best-selling vinyl albums in UK for 2025 so far
news.summary: Fontaines D.C. and Niall Horan have also secured spots on the official top 40 best-selling vinyl singles of 2025 so far in the UK.

news.title: Mary Coughlan teams up with Ultan Conlon for new single 'Lumberjack'
news.summary: The Galway native has previously collaborated with Conlon on her 2025 single 'Freefalling'

news.title: Kat Sadler: “Having to go home and live with my mum and sister again for a bit is what made Such Brave Girls happen”
news.summary: Kat Sadler talks mental health challenges, family dynamics, Pepto Bismol and Frankie Boyle with Stuart Clark. The BBC 3 ratings-grabber returns for a second season.

news.title: Connla Stokes - Mad Hatter Q&A: Biggest fear? "Being stuck in a karaoke bar for a night"
news.summary: Following the release of his book Falling for Saigon, Dublin-born writer Connla Stokes answers our Mad Hatter questions...
